venue.name: Administrative Office of the Probate Court

item.description:
TOMORROW'S RALLY AS POSTED WILL NOT GO FORWARD. WE HOPE TO RESCHEDULE TO ANOTHER DATE

We will rally at the administrative office of the Probate Court in Boston on Friday, June 26, 1:30 IF AT LEAST 30 PEOPLE CAN COMMIT TO ATTEND. This rally needs to be done but we also need to make sure enough people are there to get attention. If you can make this committment then sign on to this meetup before 7PM, Wednesday, June 24.

Directions to the rally are found here:
http://www.mapquest.c...

These are some of the slogans for the rally:

Stop Jailing DEAD Broke Fathers

Stop the War on Fathers

Probate Courts destroy kids

Thanks for a lousy fathers day without our kids.

and more.

For more information contact David at djaforlife@live.com

group.name: Greater Boston Chapter of The Fatherhood Coalition

item.name: CANCELLED:Fathers Rally at Boston Probate Court Office-2 Center Plaza
